name: Game Idea Generator (TWAssBoy)
description:
Game Idea Generator randomly puts together a game idea by combining dimension, category and theme.

It's very useful if you want to challenge yourself with new stuff and keep learning from it.

Dimension decides whether to make a 2D or 3D game. VR is also possible. Given not everyone has the equipment to develop VR games, if you can't work on a VR game, simply make a 3D game instead.

Category indicates how the game should be played. Whether it's an RPG or first-person shooter. Try to design an interesting game mechanic based on the category.

Theme gives you an idea of what the game should look or feel like.
